ISSUE.TITLE: Customer name format in header
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We already have "Customer name format" setting. But it's used to display product reviews, profile, forums ,etc. Let's decide whether we should use the same setting in the header or add a new one

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Issue 117. Use REST API for PayPal Direct Payment plugin

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1678 "CustomerName" property of "HeaderLinksModel" should have formatted name (not just email or username) #1678 Now we don't display name in the header. Now it displayed "My account". But you still can use "CustomerName" property of "HeaderLinksModel" if you want
